name: Treasure Collector
description:
A small game made for Discord Jam 4.

Collect treasure in 6 small maps in VR.

The program is testing a different movement system for VR. Mainly, it using an algorithm to keep the player in the play area while allowing them to move anywhere in the world.

Intended for a 2mx2m play space. Results can be nausea inducing.

Controls:

Movement is done by moving around the play area while the menu is closed. The camera should rotate to allow you to keep walking in that direction.

Pushing on a ledge will allow you to lift yourself up on to it.

Push chests and golden objects onto the pads to collect them for score.

Reaching the exit will record a score for how quick you were.
